document.full_text: thailand and cambodia exchanged artillery and gunfire for several hours friday in a flare-up of a long-running border dispute, and their militaries said six soldiers were killed.
document.title: thai, cambodian armies clash on border; 6 killed
lines_and_colors: thailand and cambodia exchanged artillery and gunfire for several hours friday in a flare-up of a long-running border dispute, and their militaries said six soldiers were killed.
